title: Strengthening Customer Experience Competencies: Professional Development for Mobile Learning Self-Efficacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Identify and explain at least three educational applications of mobile learning tools
Diagnose mobile learning execution capabilities using the self-efficacy measurement tool (mTSES) and develop an improvement plan
Develop at least one educational scenario using mobile learning activity design principles applicable to science subjects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
